sn55.74:4.1: “Mendicants, when four things are developed and cultivated they lead to penetrating wisdom.
sn55.74:4.4: Associating with good people, listening to the true teaching, rational focus, and practicing in line with the teaching.
sn55.74:4.5: When these four things are developed and cultivated they lead to penetrating wisdom.”
sn55.74:8.1: The Linked Discourses on Stream-Entry, the eleventh section.
